column2: t is clear that ‘P10’, P14’, ‘P15’ and ‘P22’ have all been issued due to the failure on

column1: the  part of  the  Petitioner  to have the  budget passed  by the  Council. In considering

column2: legality  of  the  decisions  contained  therein,  the  primary  issue  that  arises  for

column1: determination is whether the budget of the 6th Respondent has been passed in terms
of the law, and if not, whether the Petitioner is deemed to have resigned from the
office of Chairman as provided for by the proviso to Section 178A of the Ordinance.
